option.displaytext: GMT-5:00 Colombia(Bogota), Peru(Lima), Panama(Panama City), Puerto Rico(San Juan)
GMT-5:00 US Eastern Time, New York

device.deviceconfig:
#!version:1.0.0.1
####################################################################################### ## Auto Provisioning ## #######################################################################################
#Enable or disable the Plug and Play feature; 0-Disabled, 1-Enabled(default); auto_provision.pnp_enable = 0
#Enable or disable the phone to check the new configuration weekly; 0-Disabled (default), 1-Enabled; auto_provision.weekly.enable = 0
#Configure the week time the phone checks the new configuration. Applicable when the auto provisioning mode is configured as weekly or power on + weekly. auto_provision.weekly.mask = 0123456 auto_provision.weekly.begin_time = 00:00 auto_provision.weekly.end_time = 00:00
#Configure the URL of the auto provisioning server. {IF network=LOCALLAN} auto_provision.server.url = %%PROVLINKLOCAL%% {ELSE} auto_provision.server.url = %%PROVLINK%% {ENDIF}
#Configure the name of the common file.
auto_provision.common_file_name = y000000000146.cfg
####################################################################################### ## Network ## #######################################################################################
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Configure the maximum local RTP port. It ranges from 0 to 65535, the default value is 11800. #Require reboot; network.port.max_rtpport = %%rtp_port_max%%
#Configure the minimum local RTP port. It ranges from 0 to 65535, the default value is 11780. #Require reboot; network.port.min_rtpport = %%rtp_port_min%% {ELSE} #Configure the maximum local RTP port. It ranges from 0 to 65535, the default value is 11800. #Require reboot; network.port.max_rtpport = 12780
#Configure the minimum local RTP port. It ranges from 0 to 65535, the default value is 11780. #Require reboot; network.port.min_rtpport = 11780 {ENDIF}
#Configure the phone whether to add the MAC address to the User-Agent header; 0-Do not add, 1-Add; #Require reboot; network.sip.tag_mac_to_ua.enable = 1
####################################################################################### ## Phone Features ## #######################################################################################
sip.trust_ctrl = 1 over_the_air.url.w53h =
#Enable or disable the RFC2543 Hold feature; 0-Disabled (default), 1-Enabled; sip.rfc2543_hold = 0
#Enable or disable the phone to keep sending the SIP messages to the outbound server; 0-Disabled, 1-Enabled (default); sip.use_out_bound_in_dialog = 1
#Enable or disable the transferee to display the missed call prompt when receiving a semi_attended transfer call; #0-Disabled, 1-Enabled (default); transfer.semi_attend_tran_enable = 0
#Enable or disable the phone to complete the blind or attended transfer through on-hook; #0-Disabled(default),1-Enabled; transfer.blind_tran_on_hook_enable = 1 transfer.on_hook_trans_enable = 1
#Choose when transferred call need to be marked as successfully transferred 1-200 OK (default), 2-180 Ringing, 3-100 Trying transfer.hang_up_after_success_trans = 3
#Enable or disable the feature key synchronization, 0-Disabled (default), 1-Enabled; bw.feature_key_sync = 1
#EPhone SIP port; default is 5060 {IF network=LOCALLAN} sip.listen_port = 5060 {ENDIF} {IF network=REMOTESTUN} sip.listen_port = %%phonesipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=SBC} sip.listen_port = 5060 {ENDIF}
#Send MAC address in UA.0-Disable 1-Enable(00:11:22:33:44:55) 2-Enable(001122334455) sip.mac_in_ua = 2
####################################################################################### ## Security Settings ## #######################################################################################
#Enable or disable the phone to only accept the certificates in the Trusted Certificates list; #0-Disabled, 1-Enabled (default); security.trust_certificates = 0
#Set the password of the user or the administrator, the value format is: user:password or admin:password; security.user_password = admin:%%DEVICE_PASSWORD%% static.security.user_password = admin:%%DEVICE_PASSWORD%% static.security.user_password = user:%%DEVICE_PASSWORD%%
####################################################################################### ## Time Settings ## #######################################################################################
#Configure the time zone and time zone name. The time zone ranges from -11 to +12, the default value is +8. #The default time zone name is China(Beijing). #Refer to Yealink IP Phones User Guide for more available time zones and time zone names. #local_time.time_zone = +8 #local_time.time_zone_name = China(Beijing) local_time.time_zone = %%timezone%% local_time.time_zone_name = %%TimeZoneName%%
#Configure the domain name or the IP address of the NTP server. The default value is cn.pool.ntp.org. local_time.ntp_server1 = %%param::time_ntp_server%% local_time.ntp_server2 = %%param::time_ntp_server%%
#Configure the update interval (in seconds) when using the NTP server. The default value is 1000. local_time.interval =
#Configure the daylight saving time feature; 0-Disabled, 1-Enabled, 2-Automatic (default); local_time.summer_time = 2
#Configure the DST type when the DST feature is enabled; 0-By Date (default), 1-By Week; local_time.dst_time_type = 0
#Configure the start time of DST. The default value is 1/1/0. #If the DST type is configured as By Date, the value format is Month/Day/Hour. For example, the value 5/20/10 means the start time is at 10:00 on May 20. #If the DST type is configured as By Week, the value format is Month/Day of Week/Day of Week Last in Month/Hour of Day. #For example, the value 1/4/2/5 means the start time is at 5 o'clock on Tuesday of the 4th week in January. local_time.start_time = %%param::time_dst_start_month%%/%%param::time_dst_start_day%%/%%param::time_dst_start_hour%%
#Configure the end time of DST. The default value is 12/31/23. The value format is the same to the start time. local_time.end_time = %%param::time_dst_end_month%%/%%param::time_dst_end_day%%/%%param::time_dst_end_hour%%
#Configure the offset time (in seconds). It ranges from -300 to 300, the default value is 60. local_time.offset_time = %%param::time_utc_offset_minutes%%
#Enable or disable the DHCP Time; 0-Disabled (default), 1-Enabled; local_time.dhcp_time = 0
####################################################################################### ## Phone Features ## #######################################################################################
#Configure the return code when activating DND; 404-No Found, 480-Temporarily not available (default), 486-Busy here; #features.dnd_refuse_code = 480 features.dnd_refuse_code = 486
#Configure the return code when refusing a call. The valid values are 404, 480, 486 (default). features.normal_refuse_code =
#Enable or disable the call waiting feature; 0-Disabled, 1-Enabled (default); call_waiting.enable = 1
#Enable or disable the playing of call waiting tone; 0-Disabled, 1-Enabled (default); call_waiting.tone = 1
#Enable or disable the phone to dial the IP address directly; 0-Disabled, 1-Enabled (default); features.direct_ip_call_enable = 0
features.redial_via_local_sip_server.enable = 1
##It configures the interval (in seconds) for the phone to update the data of the remote phone book from the remote phone book server. ##The value 0 means the phone will not regularly update the data of the remote phone book from the remote phone book server. ##The default value is 21600.Integer from 3600 to 2592000,and 0. features.remote_phonebook.flash_time = %%param::phonebook_update_yealink%%
####################################################################################### ## Account1 Settings ## ####################################################################################### account.%d.check_cseq.enable = 1 account.1.enable = %%ext_01_enabled%% account.1.label = %%ext_first_name_01%% %%ext_last_name_01%% account.1.display_name =%%ext_first_name_01%% %%ext_last_name_01%% account.1.auth_name = %%ext_auth_id_01%% account.1.password = %%ext_auth_pw_01%% account.1.user_name = %%ext_int_num_01%% account.1.sip_server.1.expires = 120 {IF network=LOCALLAN} account.1.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.1.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.1.expires.legacy = 120 account.1.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.1.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=REMOTESTUN} account.1.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.1.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.1.expires.legacy = 120 account.1.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.1.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=SBC} account.1.sip_server_host.legacy = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.1.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.1.expires.legacy = 120 account.1.sip_server.1.address = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.1.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% account.1.outbound_proxy_enable = 1 account.1.outbound_proxy.1.address = %%local_sbc_ip%% account.1.outbound_proxy.1.port = %%local_sbc_port%% {ENDIF} account.1.subscribe_mwi = 1 account.1.subscribe_mwi_expires = 900 voice_mail.number.1 = %%vm_number%% account.1.100rel_enable = 0 account.1.check_cseq.enable = 1 account.1.sip_trust_ctrl = 1
account.2.enable = %%ext_02_enabled%% account.2.label = %%ext_first_name_02%% %%ext_last_name_02%% account.2.display_name = %%ext_first_name_02%% %%ext_last_name_02%% account.2.user_name = %%ext_int_num_02%% account.2.auth_name = %%ext_auth_id_02%% account.2.password = %%ext_auth_pw_02%% {IF network=LOCALLAN} account.2.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.2.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.2.expires.legacy = 120 account.2.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.2.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.2.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=REMOTESTUN} account.2.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.2.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.2.expires.legacy = 120 account.2.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.2.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.2.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=SBC} account.2.sip_server_host.legacy = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.2.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.2.expires.legacy = 120 account.2.sip_server.1.address = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.2.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.2.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% account.2.outbound_proxy_enable = 1 account.2.outbound_proxy.1.address = %%local_sbc_ip%% account.2.outbound_proxy.1.port = %%local_sbc_port%% {ENDIF} account.2.subscribe_mwi = 1 account.2.subscribe_mwi_expires = 900 voice_mail.number.2 = %%vm_number%% account.2.100rel_enable = 0 account.2.check_cseq.enable = 1 account.2.sip_trust_ctrl = 1
account.3.enable = %%ext_03_enabled%% account.3.label = %%ext_first_name_03%% %%ext_last_name_03%% account.3.display_name = %%ext_first_name_03%% %%ext_last_name_03%% account.3.user_name = %%ext_int_num_03%% account.3.auth_name = %%ext_auth_id_03%% account.3.password = %%ext_auth_pw_03%% {IF network=LOCALLAN} account.3.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.3.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.3.expires.legacy = 120 account.3.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.3.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.3.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=REMOTESTUN} account.3.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.3.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.3.expires.legacy = 120 account.3.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.3.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.3.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=SBC} account.3.sip_server_host.legacy = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.3.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.3.expires.legacy = 120 account.3.sip_server.1.address = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.3.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.3.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% account.3.outbound_proxy_enable = 1 account.3.outbound_proxy.1.address = %%local_sbc_ip%% account.3.outbound_proxy.1.port = %%local_sbc_port%% {ENDIF} account.3.subscribe_mwi = 1 account.3.subscribe_mwi_expires = 900 voice_mail.number.3 = %%vm_number%% account.3.100rel_enable = 0 account.3.check_cseq.enable = 1 account.3.sip_trust_ctrl = 1
account.4.enable = %%ext_04_enabled%% account.4.label = %%ext_first_name_04%% %%ext_last_name_04%% account.4.display_name = %%ext_first_name_04%% %%ext_last_name_04%% account.4.user_name = %%ext_int_num_04%% account.4.auth_name = %%ext_auth_id_04%% account.4.password = %%ext_auth_pw_04%% {IF network=LOCALLAN} account.4.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.4.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.4.expires.legacy = 120 account.4.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.4.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.4.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=REMOTESTUN} account.4.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.4.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.4.expires.legacy = 120 account.4.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.4.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.4.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=SBC} account.4.sip_server_host.legacy = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.4.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.4.expires.legacy = 120 account.4.sip_server.1.address = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.4.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.4.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% account.4.outbound_proxy_enable = 1 account.4.outbound_proxy.1.address = %%local_sbc_ip%% account.4.outbound_proxy.1.port = %%local_sbc_port%% {ENDIF} account.4.subscribe_mwi = 1 account.4.subscribe_mwi_expires = 900 voice_mail.number.4 = %%vm_number%% account.4.100rel_enable = 0 account.4.check_cseq.enable = 1 account.4.sip_trust_ctrl = 1

account.6.check_cseq.enable = 1 account.6.enable = %%ext_06_enabled%% account.6.label = %%ext_first_name_06%% %%ext_last_name_06%% account.6.display_name =%%ext_first_name_06%% %%ext_last_name_06%% account.6.auth_name = %%ext_auth_id_06%% account.6.password = %%ext_auth_pw_06%% account.6.user_name = %%ext_int_num_06%% {IF network=LOCALLAN} account.6.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.6.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.6.expires.legacy = 120 account.6.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.6.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.6.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=REMOTESTUN} account.6.sip_server_host.legacy = %%pbx_ip%% account.6.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.6.expires.legacy = 120 account.6.sip_server.1.address = %%pbx_ip%% account.6.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.6.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF} {IF network=SBC} account.6.sip_server_host.legacy = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.6.sip_server_port.legacy = %%param::sipport%% account.6.expires.legacy = 120 account.6.sip_server.1.address = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% account.6.sip_server.1.expires = 120 account.6.sip_server.1.port = %%param::sipport%% account.6.outbound_proxy_enable = 1 account.6.outbound_proxy.1.address = %%local_sbc_ip%% account.6.outbound_proxy.1.port = %%local_sbc_port%% {ENDIF} account.6.subscribe_mwi = 1 account.6.subscribe_mwi_expires = 900 voice_mail.number.6 = %%vm_number%% account.6.100rel_enable = 0 account.6.check_cseq.enable = 1 account.6.sip_trust_ctrl = 1

######################################################################### ## NAT Settings ## ######################################################################### {IF network=REMOTESTUN} #STUN Server configuration; sip.nat_stun.enable = 1 sip.nat_stun.server = %%pbx_ip%% sip.nat_stun.port = %%param::sipport%% {ELSE} #STUN Server configuration; sip.nat_stun.enable = 0 sip.nat_stun.server = %%param::PBXPUBLICIP%% sip.nat_stun.port = %%param::sipport%% {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.1.nat.nat_traversal = 1 sip.listen_port = %%phonesipport%% account.1.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.1.nat.nat_traversal = 0 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.2.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.2.nat.rport = 2 {else} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.2.nat.nat_traversal = 0 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.3.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.3.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.3.nat.nat_traversal = 0 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.4.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.4.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.4.nat.nat_traversal = 0 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.5.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.5.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.5.nat.nat_traversal = 0 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.6.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.6.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.6.nat.nat_traversal = 0 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.7.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.7.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.7.nat.nat_traversal = 0 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.8.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.8.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.8.nat.nat_traversal = 0 account.8.nat.rport = 2 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.9.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.9.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.9.nat.nat_traversal = 0 account.9.nat.rport = 2 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.10.nat.nat_traversal = 1 account.10.nat.rport = 2 {ELSE} #Enable or disable the NAT traversal; 0-Disabled (default), 1-STUN; account.10.nat.nat_traversal = 0 account.10.nat.rport = 2 {ENDIF}
#Configure the session timer (in seconds), the default value of T1, T2, T3 is 0.5, 4, 5. sip.timer_t1 = sip.timer_t2 = sip.timer_t4 =
#Audio codecs for account1 (Y ranges from 1 to 9). #Enable or disable the specified codec; 0-Disabled, 1-Enabled; #account.1.codec.Y.enable = #The type of the specified codec. #account.1.codec.Y.payload_type = #The priority of the specified codec. It's available when the codec is enabled. #account.1.codec.Y.priority = #The payload of the specified codec. #account.1.codec.Y.rtpmap =

account.10.codec.5.enable=0 account.10.codec.5.payload_type=iLBC account.10.codec.5.priority=5 account.10.codec.5.rtpmap=106
account.10.codec.6.enable=0 account.10.codec.6.payload_type=G726-16 account.10.codec.6.priority=6 account.10.codec.6.rtpmap=103
account.10.codec.7.enable=0 account.10.codec.7.payload_type=G726-24 account.10.codec.7.priority=7 account.10.codec.7.rtpmap=104
account.10.codec.8.enable=0 account.10.codec.8.payload_type=G726-32 account.10.codec.8.priority=8 account.10.codec.8.rtpmap=102
account.10.codec.9.enable=0 account.10.codec.9.payload_type=G726-40 account.10.codec.9.priority=9 account.10.codec.9.rtpmap=105
account.10.codec.10.channel=2 account.10.codec.10.enable=0 account.10.codec.10.payload_type=opus account.10.codec.10.priority=10 account.10.codec.10.rtpmap=107 account.10.codec.10.samplerate=48000
######################################################################### ## Handsets Configuration ## ######################################################################### phone_setting.max_number_of_handset = 10
account.1.bHandsetEnable = %%ext_01_enabled%% handset.1.name = %%ext_first_name_01%% %%ext_last_name_01%% account.1.nOutGoinglineId = 1 account.1.strIncomingLines = 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9 account.1.strOutgoingLines = 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9 handset.1.dial_out_default_line = 1

####################################################################################### ## DND ## #######################################################################################
#Enable or disable the DND feautre for account1; 0-Disabled (default), 1-Enabled; account.1.dnd.enable =
#Configure the DND on code and off code for account1. account.1.dnd.on_code = %%param::DIALCODEPROFILE%%2 account.1.dnd.off_code = %%param::DIALCODEPROFILE%%0

####################################################################################### ## Language Settings ## #######################################################################################
#Specify the web language, the valid values are: English, Chinese_S, Turkish, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, French, Russian, Deutsch and Czech. lang.wui = %%langwebUI%%
####################################################################################### ## Remote phonebook ## ####################################################################################### {IF network=LOCALLAN} directory_setting.url = %%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/Directory_setting.xml {ELSE} directory_setting.url = %%PROVLINK%%/Directory_setting.xml {ENDIF}
#Configure the access URL and dispaly name of the remote phonebook. #remote_phonebook.data.1.url = #remote_phonebook.data.1.name =
#Configure the update interval (in minutes) when using the server,It ranges from 60 to 86400 #directory.update_time_interval =
{IF network=LOCALLAN} remote_phonebook.data.1.url = %%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/yealink_phonebook.xml {ELSE} remote_phonebook.data.1.url = %%PROVLINK%%/yealink_phonebook.xml {ENDIF} remote_phonebook.data.1.name = 3CX Phonebook
